content.rendered:
IMMUSE & Global Empowerment Mission
Take One Give One Outreach Initiative

IMMUSE™ has chosen the Global Empowerment Movement to become their official partner in their Immunity Service Program. Through their “Take One Give One” outreach initiative, they are able to provide critical relief aid and immune support for people in need, all around the world. IMMUSE™ is truly passionate about promoting overall health and wellness for everyone and their mission is to ensure prevention from diseases for people who:

● Are Living in Developing Countries
● Are Affected By A Global Crisis
● Have No Access To Traditional Medicine
● Have No Access to Basic Medical Treatment

Every year, millions of people in third world countries die from illnesses. Sadly, many of these individuals do not have access to basic healthcare services and die from diseases that could have been easily prevented or properly treated. Together, with the Global Empowerment Mission, IMMUSE™ is proud to provide an advanced peptide supplement in order to help millions of families in developing countries and those affected by global crises protect themselves against diseases and illnesses.

IMMUSE™ will donate a portion of sales and products in order to provide people in need with:

● Food, Aid, Housing
● Disease Prevention
● Essential Immune Support
● Overall Health and Wellness
● Education For A Well Balanced & Healthy Lifestyle
